title: Cheesy Courgette Polenta Bake
ingredients: ['3 carrots, sliced', '1 large courgette, sliced', '1 large yellow courgette, sliced', '1 red onion, chopped', '1 red pepper, chopped', '250ml tomato pasta sauce', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '1 pinch garlic salt', 'ground black pepper to taste', '175g grated mozzarella cheese', '40g grated Parmesan cheese', '500g ready-to-eat polenta']
